links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: dtn[ L_ ] := Fold[ 2#1+#2&, 0, L ]; h[ n_ ] := dtn[ {1}~Join~Table[ Mod[ 1+Apply[ Plus, Take[ IntegerDigits[ n, 2 ], k ] ], 2 ], {k, 1, Length[ IntegerDigits[ n, 2 ] ]} ] ]; Table[ h[ n ], {n, 100} ]
